name: VSDevAids
short_description:
VSDevAids is a software package targeting Microsoft Visual Studio developers.
    It provides a very comprehensible and easy to use solution for developed applications monitoring and testing.
    In just a few minutes, you can start sampling your application internal data and force inject specific items, all in real time, without the need for debuggers and breakpoints.
    The package is designed to be used within a Visual C++ environment. However, it can work with any type of project provided that it generates debug information in the Microsoft proprietary PDB format.
